extendedInfo.description: This is a laser-light-mirror reflecting and addictive game.You have to redirect the laser with mirrors to point at a light to win each level.

reviews.comment: Great concept. Add slick graphics and music and this becomes a must have. Galaxy tab
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great puzzles, starts easy with gentle difficulty curve but later puzzles can take hours.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nostalgia
reviews.comment: I remember playing this as a kid. Great game. Controls are a little unintuitive, though. I\'d expected to be able to click and drag (like with a mouse on the computer). Other than that, great port-over.
reviews.author: Hien Nguyen

reviews.comment: Awesome fun game. Challenging, but solvable. Great mind teasers
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Intelligence testing purpose? Extremely hard for some levels.. Good game!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great game. Very addictive, and very hard. If u get too stupped, it gives u the option to see solutions to every level.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It gets harder
reviews.comment: I\'m only up to level 20 and it\'s not getting any easier... Don\'t be fooled by Oli\'s comment or anybody saying it\'s too easy- either they only played the first couple of games or they\'re a FLICKIN\' genius. Update: it\'s taken a couple of days, but I\'ve finally finished (level 34) and it\'s been fun!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The game is a good idea, but clunky controls and boring graphics ruin it. For bored very quickly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: A bit boring and no one cares what phone you have you anoyying people
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Fun @ first. Gets old quick.. can be hard/frustrating needs more redslution then a touch screen can proved. (On a EIPC no less)but still worth the D/L
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Challenging! Good time killer! So... LEVEL 31\'s POSSIBLE! REALLY? GRR! (must...not...Google...must...figure...out) UGH!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Sounds cool but dosent work for me~i1 motorola
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This game makes me feel stupid! I\'m impressed with how challenging it is in some levels. Good game!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Hey Jen did you get dropped on your head as a child? Excellent very challenging puzzle game. Tempting to cheat but I don\'t want to ruin the fun!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome game, very addictive.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great game, wish there was more levels
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works fine off the Desire S SD card. Quite a challenging puzzle game so don\'t expect to blast through it. Excellent.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Its an awesome time consuming addictive game..i like it a lot..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Onifox
reviews.comment: Its cool needs a lil something tho
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: add indicator for light travel direction (mini arrows or animated motion). animate lamps. awesome game
reviews.author: A Google User
